entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
